Detailed Description

Rods link a particle to an anchor point, generating a contact if they stray too far apart or too close.

Member Function Documentation

◆ addContact()

unsigned ParticleRodConstraint::addContact ( ParticleContact *  contact,
unsigned  limit 
) const
virtual

Fills the given contact structure with the contact needed to keep the rod from extending or compressing.

Implements cyclone::ParticleConstraint.
